subject: Swing Testing
msgSnippet: Hi, I am new to junit framework. I want to know what will be the best way to write test classes for Action Listeners of a Swing GUI. I mean how do we to test
messageBody:
Hi,
I am new to junit framework. I want to know what
will be the best way to write test classes for Action
Listeners of a Swing GUI. I mean how do we to test the
objects of Action Listener Classes.

Regards
Arvind
